value.fullName: Frequent check-in to the repository to sync your Salesforce box with SCM branch on metadata changes, including deletions
value.label: Frequent check-in to the repository to sync your Salesforce box with SCM branch on metadata changes, including deletions

value.fullName: Prevent Admins/Developers from overwriting their fellow user's metadata changes
value.label: Prevent Admins/Developers from overwriting their fellow user's metadata changes

value.fullName: Cherry-pick and deploy only delta differences within specific user stories. Dependent user stories can be pushed as well
value.label: Cherry-pick and deploy only delta differences within specific user stories. Dependent user stories can be pushed as well

value.fullName: Schedule deployments, code coverage and pre/post deployment steps
value.label: Schedule deployments, code coverage and pre/post deployment steps

value.fullName: Migrate data records (w/ dependency across objects) from one Salesforce environment to another.
value.label: Migrate data records (w/ dependency across objects) from one Salesforce environment to another.

value.fullName: Achieve CI/CD using GUI for Salesforce DX - Create contextual scratch orgs and be able to version Unlocked Packages
value.label: Achieve CI/CD using GUI for Salesforce DX - Create contextual scratch orgs and be able to version Unlocked Packages

value.fullName: Schedule pre/post deployment activities by running it with automated deployments
value.label: Schedule pre/post deployment activities by running it with automated deployments

value.fullName: Achieve "Daily Deployments" with your VCS and ALM systems
value.label: Achieve "Daily Deployments" with your VCS and ALM systems

value.fullName: Create, version and deploy nCino feature templates with dependencies. Also, version and migrate your Vlocity datapacks with dependencies
value.label: Create, version and deploy nCino feature templates with dependencies. Also, version and migrate your Vlocity datapacks with dependencies

value.fullName: Managed Package: Metadata can be versioned in Source Control and data with dependencies can be migrated to Salesforce.
value.label: Managed Package: Metadata can be versioned in Source Control and data with dependencies can be migrated to Salesforce.

value.fullName: Understand who is deploying what changes to an environment. Commits and merges can also be tracked on a periodic basis.
value.label: Understand who is deploying what changes to an environment. Commits and merges can also be tracked on a periodic basis.
